nodes.text: The Mertuen Forest was a forest on the Forest Moon of Endor. It was located west of the moon's Smuggler Outpost.

In the 2003 massively multiplayer online role-playing game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, the Mertuen Forest was one of many designated planetary regions. The game, developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, was shut down on December 15, 2011.
